notes: Amateur Botanist & Horticulturist; Dr. med. and Ober-Medizinalrat and Director, Landesfrauenklink, Erfurt (1926-1954)
source: From Hortus Third, Liberty Hyde Hortorium, (1976) Letter from U. Eggli 18 Jan. 1990; Death year from: Sabine Tolksdorf, Staatsbibliothek zu Berlin (via Alexander B. Doweld; IFPNI)
